title: Infinite Rails
description: A railway-building adventure in an endless, procedurally generated world. Lay tracks, transport passengers and goods, complete tasks, and unlock unique locomotives. Play solo or with friends and create your ultimate railway network!
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Infinite Rails-nkpbu](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0198cc44690247918e7e6389936347ee/infinite-rails-nkpbu.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Explore an Infinite World
<!--text-->
Dive into a procedurally generated world with endless possibilities. Every region you explore offers unique landscapes, resources, and challenges. From rolling plains to rugged mountains, adapt your rail-building strategy to conquer any terrain. Discover new stations and routes as you expand your network. No two worlds are ever the same, ensuring a fresh experience every time you play.

<!--image-->
![Infinite Rails-kug1e](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0198cc44690247918e7e6389936347ee/infinite-rails-kug1e.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Lay Tracks
<!--text-->
Design and build your dream railway with intuitive track-laying tools. Connect stations across vast distances and create efficient routes to optimize transportation. Strategize your track placement to avoid obstacles and minimize travel times. Experiment with complex track layouts, including junctions, loops, and switches. Watch your rail system come to life as trains follow your carefully constructed network.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Terraform
<!--text-->
Take control of the land to suit your railway-building needs. Carve trough terrain, and bridge rivers to create the ultimate routes. Use advanced tools to shape the environment and overcome natural barriers. Turn rugged terrain into a smooth path for your trains to travel. In Infinite Rails, the world bends to your vision.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Place Stations
<!--text-->
Build  stations to suit the demands of your growing railway empire or use procedurally generated ones with unique features and challenges. Strategically place them to maximize efficiency and serve passengers and industries. Upgrade stations to handle more trains, resources, and passengers. Every station is a hub of activity that brings your world to life.

<!--image-->
![Infinite Rails-eayp0](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0198cc44690247918e7e6389936347ee/infinite-rails-eayp0.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Drive Trains
<!--text-->
Step into the cab of your locomotives and take control. Drive across your tracks, delivering passengers and goods while enjoying scenic views of the procedurally generated world. Master the unique handling of different trains, each with its own characteristics and fuel types. Customize your trains for performance, appearance, and cargo capacity. Feel the thrill of being both a builder and a conductor.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Play Together (Multiplayer)
<!--text-->
Team up with friends to create the ultimate railway network. Work together to lay tracks, build stations, and complete tasks more efficiently. Share your world-building ideas and collaborate on massive projects. Compete or cooperate in a sandbox full of creative opportunities. Multiplayer brings a new dimension of fun to the Infinite Rails experience. Enjoy dedicated servers support.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Do Tasks
<!--text-->
Transport passengers and goods to complete procedurally generated tasks and challenges.
